snippet: As societal changes transform Bangalore, many young Indians are struggling to cope, and they take their problems to the only symbol of authority that is accessible around the clock: the police.
abstract: Bangalore Journal; as societal changes transform Bangalore, many young middle-class Indian couples are struggling to cope, and they are taking their domestic and marital problems to the police--the one symbol of authority that is accessible around the clock there.
lead_paragraph: As societal changes transform Bangalore, many young Indians are struggling to cope, and they take their problems to the only symbol of authority that is accessible around the clock: the police.

headline.seo: Relationships Troubled, Young Indians Seek Help From Police
headline.main: A Society’s Dizzying Changes Cast the Police in the Role of Relationship Counselor
headline.print_headline: A Society’s Dizzying Changes Cast the Police in the Role of Relationship Counselor
